updates.title: Claude Opus 4.6
updates.summary: We’re upgrading our smartest model. Across agentic coding, computer use, tool use, search, and finance, Opus 4.6 is an industry-leading model, often by wide margin.

updates.title: Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
updates.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

updates.title: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners
updates.summary: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

updates.title: Making frontier cybersecurity capabilities available to defenders
updates.summary: Claude Code Security is one step towards our goal of more secure codebases and a higher security baseline across the industry.

updates.title: Our First Proof submissions
updates.summary: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

updates.summary: 3.1 Pro is designed for tasks where a simple answer isn’t enough.

updates.title: Advancing independent research on AI alignment
updates.summary: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

updates.title: A new way to express yourself: Gemini can now create music
updates.summary: The Gemini app now features our most advanced music generation model Lyria 3, empowering anyone to make 30-second tracks using text or images.
